speaker: Oath of Iron
lines: You heat the strip until the rune goes from secret to obvious and back again.
The small anvil holds your promise without complaint.
You strike the rune into your name and your name into the rune.
Steam rises from the quench like a ghost that remembers its body fondly.
The shop outside keeps time; in here the hammer makes a clock of its own.
When you lift the piece, it weighs exactly as much as the truth.
You did not make a weapon. You made a sentence that ends well.
The smith will know. The iron already does.

give_item.name: Dragonsteel Maul
give_item.description: A maul that makes arguments short

give_item.name: Sigil Brand
give_item.description: Mark and unmake with heat that remembers
